title: How to calculate my own numerology - Quora

response.answer_text: In date of birth numerology, the date of birth of the person can be analyzed and figure out the root cause of all his struggle or all the problems he is having. Be it the career, relationship or health. There is always a root cause for this in your numbers. Once the date of birth is looked to see if it’s malefic or lucky or neutral. Similarly, numerology by name considers the full name and present the numerology number after making calculations according to various numerology systems such as Chaldean numerology or Pythagorean numerology or custom methods. These systems will have different numerology numbers for alphabets. What’s essentially a numerology chart? Well, it’s a chart or tabular representation of a collection of significant numerology numbers and their relevance or impact on our personal lives. In order to find your Life Path number, simply take your birthdate and reduce it down to its numerical value. For example, if you were born on July 5, 1989, you'd first identify the separate values of the day, month, and year: 5 july 1989 5+7+1+9+8+9=39 3+9=12 1+2=3 The life path or destiny number is 3, but if the number is 11 or 22 then you don’t reduce that number, these number are master numbers.
